pr_title: Track explicitly when we are initializing config

timeline.message: Track explicitly when we are initializing config

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @param isInitializing true if this the config is needed to create the initial configuration for the caller,
          
          
            
                 * @param isInitializing true if this config is needed to create the initial configuration for the caller,
timeline.author: jonmv
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -155,11 +155,18 @@ protected void subscribeAndHandleErrors(ConfigSubscription<?> sub, ConfigKey<?>
      *
      * If the call times out (timeout 1000 ms), no handle will have the changed flag set. You should not configure anything then.
      *
+     * @param isInitializing true if this the config is needed to create the initial configuration for the caller,

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @param isInitializing true if this the next generation is needed to create the initial configuration for the caller,
          
          
            
                 * @param isInitializing true if this next generation is needed to create the initial configuration for the caller,
timeline.author: jonmv
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -227,11 +248,18 @@ public boolean nextGeneration() {
      * If the call times out (timeout 1000 ms), no handle will have the changed flag set. You should not configure anything then.
      *
      * @param timeoutMillis timeout in milliseconds
+     * @param isInitializing true if this the next generation is needed to create the initial configuration for the caller,
